title: Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram - A Timeless Elegance
materials: this haaram is adorned with meticulously set diamonds. Features a brilliant array of Pear-shaped and Marquise-cut diamonds with exceptional clarity. Total diamond weight is 2.377 carats (473 stones).
features: This stunning necklace features a cascading three-layer design, with each layer showcasing intricate floral motifs. The diamonds are expertly set in a modern prong setting to maximize their brilliance and fire. The floral clusters transition into elegant Pear-shaped diamond drops in some places, adding a touch of sophistication. Contemporary design inspired by traditional Telugu artistry.
colors: Predominantly white due to the diamonds
contrasted by the underlying gold's subtle sheen.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and high-profile parties. This statement piece will add a regal touch to any bridal ensemble or formal attire. Also suitable for Sangeeth and other celebratory events.
description: A modern take on the classic Haaram, this necklace combines traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design sensibilities. The exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality diamonds make it a timeless heirloom piece. Its intricate floral design symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, making it an auspicious gift. The cascading design creates a flattering and elegant silhouette.
